Package com.gerard.site.controller.tag

Class DefineLanguageAttributesTag

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
com.gerard.site.controller.tag.DefineLanguageAttributesTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag, Serializable
public class DefineLanguageAttributesTag extends jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
Custom JSP-tag, defines and sets in the app locale and bundle due to this locale .

Firstly checks cookies, if no app supported language Language was found (or null) tries to get language from request header, if no app supported language was found (or null) in the request header uses default language .

Version:
1.0
Author:
Liliya Siadzelnikava
See Also:
Language, Serialized Form

    • getCookieByName

      private static jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie getCookieByName​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String cookieName)
      Finds cookie in the request by it's name, may return null . May return null value .
      Parameters:
      request - request to find cookie in
      cookieName - cookie name to find in the specified request
      Returns:
      returns target cookie by specified name, otherwise returns null
